Module vom_vegwat_mod

474 : 
475 : !     ******************************************************************
476 : !     * Module defining variables and parameters common to both the
477 : !     * vegetation model (transpmodel) and water balance model (watbal).
478 : !     ******************************************************************
479 : 
480 :       module vom_vegwat_mod
481 :       use vom_file_mod
482 :       use vegmod
483 :       use watmod
484 :       implicit none
485 : 
486 :       INTEGER :: s_maxlayer             ! Number of soil layers
487 : 
488 :       REAL*8  :: i_cz                   ! Average soil elevation in m
489 : 
490 :       REAL*8  :: i_delz                 ! Thickness of each soil layer (m)
491 :       REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: s_delz(:)  ! Thickness of each soil layer
492 : 
493 :       !$OMP threadprivate( i_cz )
494 : 
495 : 
496 :       end module vom_vegwat_mod
